summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Student Management System after role-based registration fixes. Major improvements verified - admin registration and role-based access control now working correctly. Backend APIs highly functional (29/30 tests passed).

flaky_endpoints.issue: Teacher access to users endpoint returns no response instead of 403
flaky_endpoints.impact: Minor - role-based access control logic works but response handling needs improvement

ui_bugs.issue: React SelectItem component throwing runtime errors on Users page
User session appears to expire or redirect unexpectedly during navigation

passed_tests: ✅ User registration with admin role - role saved correctly
✅ Admin can see all navigation items (Dashboard, Students, Classes, Attendance, Grades, Users)
✅ Admin role display in UI - working correctly
✅ Frontend registration form with role selection
✅ Frontend user registration flow with admin role
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor improvements needed: Fix SelectItem component errors on Users page and improve session management for better navigation stability. Consider adding error boundaries for React components.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (role-based features now working, minor UI issues remain)
